content: calls for 2 50-gram skeins sport weight yarn bernat magic sport lion baby soft and caron cuddle soft are mentioned no yardage specified pattern is for newborn to 3 months with suggestions for making a 3-6 month size additional materials 5-6 buttons **editor s note ** this pattern is knit in stockinette stitch with ribbing at the collar cuffs and bottom hem other similar carole barenys patterns from knitting on the net are - seamless raglan baby cardigan sweater 1 - stockinette with garter stitch collar cuffs and hem - seamless yoked baby cardigan 2 - stockinette with slip-stitch decorative row on yoke and at cuffs and hem - top down seamless raglan baby sweater garter ridge version 3 - garter ridge pattern with ribbed collar cuffs and hem 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/seamless-raglan-baby-cardigan-sweater 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/seamless-yoked-baby-cardigan 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/top-down-seamless-raglan-baby-sweater-garter-ridge-version
